professions.oneLiner: Yes, but AI acts as a high-speed diagnostic assistant, not the ultimate bearer of ethical and legal accountability.
summaryBullets: AI accelerates diagnostic data synthesis and imaging interpretation, reducing manual review time.
Clinical decision-making remains human-centric due to medical ethics, complex patient variables, and legal liability.
The role is shifting from data-gathering to high-level interpretation and compassionate patient management.
